Fields

Domain

The domain to which the cookie belongs (e.g. "www.vuplex.com", "example.com").

Declaration
public string Domain
Field Value
Type Description
System.String

ExpirationDate

A number representing the expiration date of the cookie as the number of seconds since the UNIX epoch, or 0 if there is no expiration date. An expiration date is not provided for session cookies.

Declaration
public int ExpirationDate
Field Value
Type Description
System.Int32

HttpOnly

Indicates whether the cookie is marked as HttpOnly (i.e. the cookie is inaccessible to client-side scripts).

Declaration
public bool HttpOnly
Field Value
Type Description
System.Boolean

Name

The name of the cookie.

Declaration
public string Name
Field Value
Type Description
System.String

Path

The URL path of the cookie (e.g. "/", "/products/1234"). The default is "/".

Declaration
public string Path
Field Value
Type Description
System.String

Secure

Indicates whether cookie is marked as secure (i.e. its scope is limited to secure channels, typically HTTPS).

Declaration
public bool Secure

System.Boolean
